snippet: Shares in Chesapeake Energy leaped after the company finally acceded to shareholder demands by stripping its chief executive, Aubrey McClendon, of his chairman role and ending his controversial compensation plan.
abstract: Shares in Chesapeake Energy leaped after the company finally acceded to shareholder demands by stripping its chief executive, Aubrey McClendon, of his chairman role and ending his controversial compensation plan.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Some Relief for Shareholders as Chesapeake Seeks New Chairman
